casebody.data:
MOSBY
v.
INGRAM, et al. No. 354P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Christopher Mosby, Brunswick, for Mosby, Christopher. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of January 2016 by Petitioner for Petition for Appellate Review:

*471"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
